summary: Ever wondered why you couldn't turn ingots such as Gold into Septims? Well thats because they had not thought of it, but now you can!
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to take one Ingot of Iron along with an Ingot of Gold and turn it into One hundred pieces of gold.

Now you may be thinking, "But mod maker! Why would we need the iron? Isn't that a bit inaccurate because its just made of gold?" Ahhh maybe, but think of it this way, If you are to take any coin today and are to melt it down, what do you get? Well obviously you would get to go to jail but that's besides it, What you would get is a mix of metals along with the metal on the outside, like penny's would get Copper and nickels would get... Nickel, So it would make sense for a item such as a Septim to have a Gold outside and a Iron core. Plus this idea of smelting Ingots down to Septims could be helpful for new characters who cant get that much gold off of simple items that they sell, and items that cost a butt-ton.

This mod should work with all other mods, if you find one that doesn't, tell me in the posts and ill hopefully have it fixed.
author: ThreeCubed
